sentences.en: Either dogs or humans can satisfy this need for companionship.
sentences.cn: 不论是犬还是人,都能满足这种对伙伴的需要.

sentences.en: He found something very charming in the innocent companionship of these simple - hearted girls.
sentences.cn: 他呢,置身在这些纯朴无邪的女孩子中间则感到妙不可言,其乐无穷.

sentences.en: He found very little congenial companionship in this casual Western city.
sentences.cn: 他在这个变化莫测的西部城市很少能找到意气相投的友情.

sentences.en: I depended on his companionship and on his judgment.
sentences.cn: 我信赖他的友情，也相信他的判断。

sentences.en: I worte on in silence, quietly enjoying the little thing's companionship.
sentences.cn: 我不动声色地写, 默默享受着这小家伙亲近的情意.

sentences.en: It was now time for him to adorn his life with the graces of female companionship.
sentences.cn: 眼下已到了用伉俪点缀他的生活的时刻.

sentences.en: She found the companionship of Marcia a solace.
sentences.cn: 她觉得马西娅的陪伴是莫大的安慰。

sentences.en: She longed for companionship that was more mature.
sentences.cn: 她渴望与比较成熟的人交往.

sentences.en: The lonely man starved for companionship.
sentences.cn: 这个孤独的人渴望有人陪伴.

sentences.en: The majority of people own a dog for companionship.
sentences.cn: 大多数人养狗是为了有个伴儿。

sentences.en: Their marriage reforms, assumes a light and hypocritical companionship.
sentences.cn: 他们的婚姻生活却从此变了样, 而变为一种浮而不实的伴侣关系.

sentences.en: They meet at the club for companionship and advice.
sentences.cn: 他们在俱乐部相会是为了联谊和寻求建议。

sentences.en: We have a very amiable companionship.
sentences.cn: 我们之间存在一种友好的关系.

sentences.en: When Stan died, I missed his companionship.
sentences.cn: 斯坦去世后，我怀念我们的友情。

sentences.en: You have an intellectual rapport, a kind of easy companionship that makes me really jealous.
sentences.cn: 你机智友善、平易近人，真是让我嫉妒。

words.tran_cn: 好交往的；友善的；适于做朋友的

trans.tran_en: when you are with someone you enjoy being with, and are not alone
